item.title: After giving birth to daughter, Radhika Apte confesses neither she nor husband ‘wanted kids, but there was this one per cent curiosity…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Radhika Apte Opens Up About Unexpected Motherhood Journey

Date: December 2024
Source: Indian Express

Radhika Apte reflects candidly on her unexpected journey into motherhood, sharing her initial shock upon learning of her pregnancy.

  • Apte and her husband had not planned for kids but felt a curiosity about parenthood.
  • She describes the moment of realization as a mix of surprise and humor.
  • Counseling psychologist Priyamvada Tendulkar comments on the identity shift new mothers experience.
  • Strategies to navigate motherhood include accepting uncertainty and challenging perfectionism.
  • The importance of normalizing conversations about the complex emotions of motherhood is emphasized.
“I think it’s easier when people know whether they want a child or not... there was this one per cent curiosity about what it would be like.” - Radhika Apte

Radhika’s story encourages a more nuanced conversation about motherhood, focusing on self-discovery and acceptance of mixed feelings.

item.title: Allu Aravind visits Pushpa 2 premiere stampede victim in hospital; says this about Allu Arjun's absence - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Aravind visits Pushpa 2 premiere stampede victim in hospital; remarks on Allu Arjun's absence

Date: December 18, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

A tragic incident at the premiere of Pushpa 2: The Rule led to the death of a woman and her son's hospitalization due to a stampede. Allu Aravind visited the affected boy in the hospital and spoke about Allu Arjun's absence regarding the situation.

  • A stampede occurred at the Pushpa 2 premiere, resulting in one death and a young boy hospitalized.
  • Allu Aravind visited the hospitalized boy and expressed support for his recovery.
  • Allu Arjun's absence at the hospital has raised questions; Aravind explained legal constraints preventing visitation.
  • Arjun is facing legal action related to the incident, having been arrested and later released on bail.
“I just visited Sri Tej in the ICU. The boy has been recovering slowly... We are ready to support in any way we can to help him recover.” - Allu Aravind

The incident has sparked significant discussion regarding crowd safety and the responsibilities of public figures.

item.title: Atlee reacts to Baby John facing competition with Pushpa 2: The Rule, says 'Allu Arjun spoke' to him and... - DNA India
item.description:
Atlee reacts to Baby John facing competition with Pushpa 2: The Rule

Publication Date: December 18, 2024

Source: DNA India

Filmmaker Atlee discusses the competition his upcoming production Baby John will face against Allu Arjun's successful film Pushpa 2: The Rule.

  • Pushpa 2 has grossed over Rs 1400 crores since its release on December 5.
  • Atlee's film Baby John, starring Varun Dhawan, is set to release on December 25.
  • Atlee emphasizes the friendly relationship with Allu Arjun, referring to their films co-existing instead of clashing.
  • Allu Arjun congratulated Atlee on Baby John, showcasing their strong friendship in the industry.
  • Atlee expresses his desire to work with every superstar in the country without feeling pressure.
“See it is an eco-system. Me and Allu Arjun sir are very good friends. I want Pushpa 2 to do great, I want Baby John to do great.”

In conclusion, Atlee remains positive about the prospects of Baby John amidst the competition posed by Pushpa 2, highlighting strong industry friendships.

item.title: Game Changer: Shankar locks the final copy of the Ram Charan starrer - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer: Shankar locks the final copy of the Ram Charan starrer

Published on Dec 18, 2024

Source: 123telugu

The highly anticipated film featuring Ram Charan, directed by Shankar, has reached a significant milestone as the final cut has been locked.

  • The film is set for release on January 10, 2024, in a record number of screens.
  • Producer Dil Raju expresses excitement over the film’s emotional depth and grand visuals.
  • Ram Charan portrays a double role in this action drama.
  • A new song from the movie, composed by Thaman, is expected to be released soon.
“The action drama will captivate audiences with its emotional depth and grand visuals.” - Producer Dil Raju

Fans are eagerly awaiting further updates as the film approaches its release date.

item.title: Peak Bengaluru moment: Woman argues with Nita Ambani's bodyguard over road blockage, netizens say, ‘Aunty had enough’ | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Peak Bengaluru moment: Woman argues with Nita Ambani’s bodyguard over road blockage, netizens say, ‘Aunty had enough’

Publication Date: Recent, Source: Live Mint

In a provocative encounter, a woman was seen confronting a bodyguard over the traffic disruption caused by Nita Ambani’s vehicle. While Ambani waved at the gathered crowd, the incident sparked various reactions online.

  • The woman expressed frustration over the road blockage.
  • Nita Ambani was captured entering her bulletproof vehicle as the incident unfolded.
  • Netizens overwhelmingly supported the woman, applauding her bravery.
“Kudos to aunty for standing up. Wealth does not give you right to disrupt the lives of common people by blocking paths.”

This incident highlights the ongoing tension between public inconvenience and the privileges of wealth.

item.title: Shahid Kapoor, Kriti Sanon to reunite for the 2nd time in Homi Adajania's Cocktail 2: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Shahid Kapoor, Kriti Sanon to reunite for the 2nd time in Homi Adajania's Cocktail 2: Report

Date: Dec 18, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

A sequel to the 2012 film Cocktail is reportedly underway, with Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon reuniting for the project directed by Homi Adajania.

  • The sequel will be based on a story written by Luv Ranjan.
  • Dinesh Vijan is set to produce the film.
  • The film will feature a love triangle and is in search of another female lead.
  • Shahid and Kriti expressed excitement about the script after their previous collaboration in Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya.
  • The casting process is ongoing, with filming expected to start in May 2025.
“After the success of Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya, Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon are reuniting on Cocktail 2. The duo loved the script and are excited to venture into the world of this romantic comedy,” a source has shared.

This upcoming sequel aims to capture the charm and intrigue established in the original film, which was a significant success upon its release.

item.title: Allu Arjun's Father Meets Stampede Victim's Husband, Visits Injured Son In Hospital - News18
item.description:
Allu Arjun's Father Meets Stampede Victim's Husband, Visits Injured Son In Hospital

Date: December 18, 2024 Source: News18

Allu Arjun’s father, Allu Aravind, visited a Hyderabad hospital to check on a child injured in the December 4 stampede during the screening of 'Pushpa 2: The Rule'. He also met with the family of the deceased woman.

  • Allu Aravind visited the injured child in the hospital.
  • The health of the child is critical; he has suffered brain damage and is on ventilator support.
  • Telangana Health Secretary and Hyderabad Police Commissioner also visited and provided updates on the child's condition.
  • The stampede resulted in the death of a 35-year-old woman and severe injuries to her 9-year-old son.
“I remain deeply concerned about young Sri Tej, who is under constant medical care after the unfortunate incident. My prayers remain with them...” - Allu Arjun

This incident has brought significant attention to safety measures during public events.

item.title: SRK Still Not Understanding Ground Reality - M9
item.description:
SRK Still Not Understanding Ground Reality

Publication Date: Not specified Source: M9 News

Shah Rukh Khan's insistence on sticking to romantic roles is becoming a hindrance as audience preferences shift towards dynamic characters.

  • SRK has favored traditional romantic roles over new-age characters.
  • After the success of *Jawan*, he recognized the value of Atlee's creation, Vikram Rathore.
  • The evolution in viewer expectations suggests a need for SRK to adapt his acting choices.
  • To remain relevant, SRK must collaborate with diverse directors and embrace different roles.
If he can come out of his romantic self, then Shah Rukh Khan will be relevant.

To sustain his legacy, SRK should explore various roles that resonate with both younger and older audiences.

item.title: Photo Moment : Newlywed director meets blockbuster filmmaker - 123telugu
item.description:
Photo Moment: Newlywed Director Meets Blockbuster Filmmaker

Published on Dec 18, 2024 - Source: 123telugu.com

Newlywed director Sandeep Raj meets his idol, blockbuster filmmaker SS Rajamouli, alongside his wife at a recent event, creating a viral moment on social media.

  • Sandeep Raj is recognized for his National Award-winning debut film.
  • He recently married Chandini Rao, receiving congratulatory messages from fans and celebrities.
  • The couple met SS Rajamouli, who is currently in pre-production for his new project.
  • Sandeep Raj is preparing to launch his upcoming film "Mowgli 2025" starring Roshan Kanakala.
“The couple has been showered with congratulations from fans and celebrities alike.”

Stay tuned for updates on upcoming projects from both directors.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office: Allu Arjun’s Film Rules At #2 Beating Kalki 2898 AD, RRR & Every Other Indian Film In The Gulf, Guess Who’s At Top? - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office: Allu Arjun’s Film Rules At #2 Beating Kalki 2898 AD

Publication Date: December 5, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 is a force to reckon with, not just in India but also in international circuits. Allu Arjun starrer has achieved massive milestones as it is amongst the highest-grossing Tollywood films in the Gulf countries. Scroll below for a detailed comparison with Kalki 2898 AD, RRR, Salaar and others!

Box Office Collection in UAE-GCC

As per the last update, Pushpa 2: The Rule has made box office collections of 42.89 crores gross in the Gulf in 11 days since its release. It is only the second Indian film to have crossed the 40 crore mark in history.

  • Baahubali 2: 87.28 crores
  • Pushpa 2: 42.89 crores
  • RRR: 39.60 crores
  • Kalki 2898 AD: 35.50 crores
  • Saaho: 23.77 crores

Conclusion

Pushpa 2’s unprecedented success in box office collections places it firmly behind only Baahubali 2: The Conclusion as the second-highest Tollywood grosser in the international market.

item.title: Prabhas promises Japanese fans ahead of Kalki 2898 AD release - 123telugu
item.description:
Prabhas promises Japanese fans ahead of Kalki 2898 AD release

Published on: Dec 18, 2024 Source: 123telugu

Pan-Indian superstar Prabhas shares a heartfelt message with his fans in Japan, explaining his absence from the Japanese premiere of Kalki 2898 AD.

  • Prabhas canceled his trip to Japan due to an injury sustained on set.
  • He sent a video to apologize and connect with his fans, thanking them for their support.
  • Prabhas plans to visit Japan soon and encourages fans to enjoy the film, releasing on January 3, 2025.
  • Speculations suggest he may travel to Japan in early January, pending recovery from his injury.
"I assure you that I will visit Japan soon to meet you in person." - Prabhas

Fans are eagerly awaiting updates regarding Prabhas's visit to Japan as they continue to support his latest film.

item.description:
Kriti Sanon Teams Up with Shahid Kapoor for Cocktail 2

Published on: Dec 18, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Cocktail 2 will star Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon, directed by Homi Adajania, with filming set to begin in May 2025.

  • The movie is a sequel to the successful 2012 film Cocktail.
  • It features Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon in lead roles, while a third actress is being sought to complete the love triangle.
  • The script is penned by Luv Ranjan, who is also involved in the creative process.
  • The producer, Dinesh Vijan, aims to revive romantic comedies with this film.
  • Cocktail 2 is described as a wholesome entertainer loaded with humor and emotional friendship.
“Shahid Kapoor and Kriti Sanon are excited to venture into the world of this romantic comedy.”

This upcoming film is anticipated to attract significant attention and aims to bring back the charm of romantic comedies in Bollywood.

item.title: Rashmika’s ‘Private’ Affairs with Bollywood Star - M9
item.description:
Rashmika's Private Affairs with Bollywood Star

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: M9 News

Rashmika Mandhana is gearing up for her upcoming Bollywood projects after her recent film 'Animal'. She is set to star in Vicky Kaushal’s 'Chhava' and Salman Khan’s 'Sikandar', directed by A. R. Murugadoss.

  • Rashmika's anticipation for 'Sikandar' amid hopes for Salman Khan's comeback.
  • Rashmika wishes to keep her conversations with Salman Khan private, adding to fans' curiosity.
  • She emphasizes the importance of holding onto personal connections.
  • This collaboration is expected to positively impact their careers.
“Whatever Salman sir and I talk about will always remain between us. I think it’s important to hold to these connections without flaunting them.” - Rashmika Mandhana

With Rashmika's rising fame and the excitement surrounding her roles, this partnership with Salman Khan signals significant potential for both actors in the industry.

item.title: Aamir Khan Productions breaks silence over ‘Laapataa Ladies’ Oscars 2025 snub - The Hindu
item.description:
Aamir Khan Productions Reacts to 'Laapataa Ladies' Oscars 2025 Snub

Published: December 18, 2024, Source: The Hindu

Aamir Khan Productions has issued an official statement following the exclusion of Laapataa Ladies from the Oscars 2025 shortlist for Best International Feature Film. The Film Federation of India’s decision to bypass the Kiran Rao-directed satire sparked significant backlash among cinephiles and industry figures alike.

  • The film, which critiques the patriarchy in rural India, was critically acclaimed but not shortlisted for the Oscars.
  • Aamir Khan Productions expressed disappointment but emphasized gratitude for the support received.
  • The statement highlighted the honor of being considered among the finest films globally, despite the snub.
  • Critics have raised concerns about the selection criteria of the Film Federation of India.
  • The situation has drawn attention back to Payal Kapadia’s Cannes-winning film, All We Imagine As Light, viewed as India’s strongest contender.
“Laapataa Ladies did not make it to the Academy Awards shortlist this year, and we are of course disappointed, but equally we are immensely grateful for the incredible support and belief we’ve received throughout this journey.”

The exclusion of Laapataa Ladies adds another chapter to India’s contentious history with the Academy Awards.

item.title: Rashmika Mandanna opens up about relationship with Vijay Deverakonda? Says her partner gives her comfort - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Rashmika Mandanna confirms being in a relationship as she talks about her partner being her comfort place during her tough days.

Date: Dec 18, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Rashmika Mandanna has been the center of relationship rumors with actor Vijay Deverakonda. In a recent conversation, she discussed the importance of her partner in her life, emphasizing the comfort and empathy he provides.

  • Rashmika confirms her relationship amidst ongoing speculation.
  • She attributes her strength during tough times to her partner.
  • Highlights the necessity of kindness and respect in a relationship.
  • Describes love as essential partnership and companionship.
  • Vijay Deverakonda has also acknowledged their relationship at a promotional event.
“My partner. I need my partner in every phase of my life. I need that comfort, security, and empathy.” - Rashmika Mandanna

Rashmika will be starring in upcoming films including 'The Girlfriend' and projects alongside Salman Khan and Vicky Kaushal.

item.title: Indian woman quits YouTube after investing ₹8 lakh in channel: ‘Let me confess…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Indian YouTuber Nalini Unagar Quits After Investing ₹8 Lakh

Date: Dec 18, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Nalini Unagar, an Indian YouTuber, has announced her departure from YouTube after three years, stating that her substantial investment brought her no returns. She criticized YouTube's algorithm for favoring some creators over others.

  • Nalini invested ₹8 lakh in her YouTube channel, 'Nalini's Kitchen Recipes', over three years but received no financial return.
  • She amassed only 2,450 subscribers during this period, leading her to delete all videos.
  • In social media posts, she expressed anger at YouTube, feeling unsupported as a creator.
  • Despite the struggles, many followers urged her to continue, but she felt luck was not on her side.
  • Nalini emphasized the need for luck in online content creation and warned against relying on it as a primary income source.
“I failed in my YouTube career, so I’m selling all my kitchen accessories and studio equipment. Let me confess today—I have invested approximately ₹8 lakhs in my YouTube channel for building a kitchen, buying studio equipment, and promotions. The return? ₹0.”

In conclusion, Nalini's experience highlights the challenges faced by content creators in monetizing their efforts, despite the growing popularity of online platforms.

item.title: Kalki 2898 AD: Nag Ashwin overwhelmed by Japanese fans’ love - 123telugu
item.description:
Kalki 2898 AD: Nag Ashwin overwhelmed by Japanese fans’ love

Published on Dec 18, 2024 2:00 pm IST

Japanese audiences have always had a special admiration for Tollywood films, and with Kalki 2898 AD set for a Japanese release, director Nag Ashwin's visit has caused quite a stir.

  • Director Nag Ashwin visited Japan to promote Kalki 2898 AD.
  • Prabhas was unable to attend the promotional events due to a minor injury.
  • The film is set to release in Japan on January 3, 2025.
  • Nag Ashwin shared a touching moment with fans who wrote him letters in Telugu script.
  • Filmmaker expressed deep appreciation for the love shown by Japanese fans.
“V rarely get overwhelmed… but Japanese love is like that. Diff level. They learned & wrote in Telugu script. Full love right back to you all. Arigato gozaimas.” - Nag Ashwin

This visit is not only a promotional effort but symbolizes the growing love for Indian cinema in Japan.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 13: Allu Arjun’s Franchise Total Surpasses Baahubali 1 + 2 & KGF: Chapter 1 + 2 – Decoding All Hindi Numbers! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 13: Allu Arjun’s Franchise Total Surpasses Baahubali 1 + 2 & KGF

Publication Date: December 17, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun has made history with the Hindi version of Pushpa 2, achieving a 13-day box office total of ₹601.50 crore, marking it as the fastest film to reach 600 crores in Indian Cinema.

  • On day 13, the film earned ₹19.50 crore, only ₹1 crore less than the previous day.
  • The total box office collection for both Hindi parts of the franchise is ₹707.50 crore.
  • This franchise has surpassed the box office totals of both Baahubali films and KGF.
“Pushpa 2 is officially now the highest-grossing Hindi-dubbed South Indian franchise at the box office.”

This record-breaking achievement highlights the franchise's immense popularity and the growing success of dubbed South Indian films in Hindi cinema.

item.title: Diljit Dosanjh Concert In Chandigarh Breached Prescribed Noise Limits, Strict Action Against Violators... - Live Law - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Chandigarh Concert Exceeds Noise Limits, Legal Action Proposed

Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: Live Law

The Union Territory of Chandigarh has informed the Punjab and Haryana High Court that the concert held by singer Diljit Dosanjh on December 14 breached the noise limits, recommending strict action against the violators.

  • The High Court had previously allowed the concert under specific noise regulations.
  • Noise levels were monitored and exceeded the 75-decibel limit set by environmental regulations.
  • The UT administration proposed actions under the Environment (Protection) Act and related noise pollution regulations.
  • A PIL was filed by resident Ranjeet Singh, calling for a comprehensive report on the concert's management.
  • Hearing on the matter has been adjourned to the first week of January.
The court stated, "Since there is no urgency in this matter, we will hear this in January...there are other important matters waiting."

This case emphasizes the need for compliance with environmental laws during large events and could result in stricter regulations in the future.

item.title: Woman quits YouTube career after investing Rs 8 lakh, deletes 250 videos. Viral post - India Today
item.description:
YouTuber Nalini Unagar Quits After Heavy Investment and No Returns

Published On: Dec 18, 2024 Source: India Today

Nalini Unagar, a YouTuber known for her cooking channel, announced she is quitting content creation after investing over Rs 8 lakh without any return on her investment. She has deleted all her videos and is selling her kitchen accessories and equipment.

  • Nalini invested Rs 8 lakh over three years on her channel, 'Nalini's Kitchen Recipe'.
  • Despite creating over 250 videos, she received no income from YouTube.
  • Her decision to quit has sparked discussions about the challenges of online content creation.
  • Online users have expressed support and advice regarding her struggles.
“I failed in my YouTube career, so I’m selling all my kitchen accessories and studio equipment. If anyone is interested in buying, please let me know,” - Nalini Unagar.

The discussion around her quitting has highlighted the difficulties content creators face in achieving success on platforms like YouTube, emphasizing the unpredictable nature of online fame.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna’s half-hearted apology to Sonakshi Sinha amidst Ramayana row sparks outrage; ‘Not so ‘Sorry Shaktimaan’’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna’s Half-Hearted Apology to Sonakshi Sinha Sparks Outrage

Date: Dec 18, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Mukesh Khanna has faced backlash following a social media apology regarding his comments on Sonakshi Sinha. The situation escalated after Khanna blamed her father for her performance on a famous quiz show, prompting a response from both Sonakshi and her father, Shatrughan Sinha.

  • Khanna revisited Sonakshi’s 2019 appearance on Kaun Banega Crorepati 11.
  • Sonakshi Sinha reminded Khanna about the value of forgiveness, quoting Lord Rama.
  • Shatrughan Sinha defended his daughter publicly.
  • Khanna claimed he was trying to educate the younger generation with his remarks.
  • Social media users criticized Khanna’s apology, calling it insincere.
“Not so ‘Sorry Shaktimaan’,” commented a user on social media, highlighting Khanna's lack of genuine remorse.

The public reaction indicates that Khanna’s attempt to stay relevant may have backfired, leaving him with diminished respect among fans.

item.title: Laapataa Ladies team disappointed after Kiran Rao's film exits Oscars 2025 race: ‘For us, this is not the end’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Laapataa Ladies Team Disappointed After Oscars 2025 Exit

Date: Dec 18, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The team behind the film Laapataa Ladies expressed their disappointment after the film did not make the shortlist for the Best International Feature at the Oscars 2025. Despite the setback, they thanked the Academy and celebrated the recognition as India’s official entry.

  • The film failed to secure a position in the Oscars 2025 shortlist.
  • Makers expressed gratitude to the Academy and FFI jury.
  • The film's story revolves around two newly-wed brides exchanged during a train ride.
  • Filmmaker Hansal Mehta criticized the Film Federation of India for its selection process.
  • Fans and critics expressed disappointment on social media regarding the film's exclusion.
“For us, this is not the end but a step forward. We remain committed to bringing more powerful stories to life.”

The Laapataa Ladies team is determined to continue their journey in filmmaking, despite the Oscars disappointment.

item.title: Mufasa The Lion King: Mahesh Babu’s iconic cutouts steal the show - 123telugu
item.description:
Mufasa The Lion King: Mahesh Babu’s iconic cutouts steal the show

Published on: Dec 18, 2024 1:00 pm IST

A wave of Telugu movies is set to release soon, with the Hollywood film Mufasa: The Lion King generating significant buzz. Set for release on December 20, 2024, the film features Mahesh Babu lending his voice to Mufasa in the Telugu version.

  • The film will be released in English, Telugu, and other Indian languages.
  • Large cutouts of Mahesh Babu have been erected in theaters across Telugu states.
  • A special screening is planned for the release day in Hyderabad.
  • The movie is a sequel to the 2019 hit The Lion King, produced by Walt Disney Pictures.
“It remains to be seen how the movie will perform in the Telugu states.”

This collaboration marks a historic moment for Tollywood as Mahesh Babu becomes the first star hero honored with a massive cutout for dubbing a character.
